title: What are the funkiest hip hop songs ever? - Quora

response.answer_text: You’ve prompted me to write a comprehensive blog… And i’ll get to that. But for now, here are a few off the top of my head: Amongst The Madness by The Next Men  Check Yo Self by Ice Cube featuring Das EFX  Comin’ Thru by Chali 2na  Bug Powder Dust (LA Funk Mob Remix) by Bomb The Bass & Justin Warfield  Until Heaven Stops The Rain by Wax Tailor  Ring Ring Ha Ha Hey Hey by De La Soul
I like to think in terms of albums. The first ones that spring to mind are:   Lord Finesse - Funky Technician    DJ Format - Music For The Mature B-Boy   Big Daddy Kane - It's A Big Daddy Thing
